Name: Father is a teacher
Description: You get the information whether the student's father works as a teacher or whether he works as something else.

Name: Mother has only basic education
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother received only basic education (no education at all / primary school until 4th grade) or more than that.

Name: Mother is a house wife
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother is a house wife and is not otherwise employed or whether she works something else.

Name: Mother works something else
Description: You get the information whether the student's mother is neither a housewife nor works in neither teaching, health care, civil services (e.g. administrative or police).

Name: Parents live together
Description: You get the information whether the student's parents live together or separated.

Name: Many absences
Description: You get the information whether the student has a high number of absences (more than 21) or not.

Name: Student is old
Description: You get the information whether the student belongs to the older part of the class (older than 19 years) or to the younger part.

Name: Few failed classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed at maximum one class or if he/she failed more classes.

Name: Failed two classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed exactly 2 classes.

Name: Failed 3+ classes
Description: You get the information whether the student has failed three / more than three classes or whether the student has failed less than three classes.

Name: Small family
Description: You get the information whether the student's family size is rather small (less or equal to three) or bigger than that.

Name: Average health status
Description: You get the information whether the student has an average health status (not bad, but also not exceptional) or another health status.

Name: Higher education
Description: You get the information whether the student said that he/she would like to pursue higher education after finishing high school.

Name: Extra paid classes
Description: You get the information whether the student takes extra-curricular paid classes (besides the mandatory ones) or not.

Name: Studies little
Description: You get the information whether the student spends less than five hours per week studying or more than that.
